title: Reasons for eating fast food in the U.S. as of August 2014
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
Response Convenient has the highest Share of respondents and Other has the lowest Share of respondents.
There is a difference of 61.6 between the maximum Response Convenient and minimum Response Other.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
Response Convenient has the highest Share of respondents and Other has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
Response Convenient has the highest Share of respondents and Other has the lowest Share of respondents.
There is a difference of 61.6 between the maximum Response Convenient and minimum Response Other.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 67.2 is found at Response Convenient and the minimum is found at Other where Response is 5.6.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 61.6.
Response Convenient is higher than any other Responses with value 67.2, followed by Cheap, and I just like it. Down to Response Other with the lowest value 5.6.
The lowest value 5.6 at Other is almost 2.27 times smaller than the average value 29.66.
